channel.title: Need Help with t2 and t1 errors! 317 [PI]
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 109 at client.drawChannelButtons(client.java:774) at client.drawChatArea(client.java:806) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10972) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11849) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:192) at client.run(client.java:6505) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] Anyone know how to fix this?^
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/843/cmdk.jpg/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/8596/cmdk.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
I always get these errors and make me lag or dc everyone off the server. need help BAD.

item.title: Need Help with t2 and t1 errors! 317 [PI]

item.description:
@dung wrote:

i just searched “(200);” everywheres in my client and source and could’t find anything do you have skype? if you do maybe you could help me on there

item.title: Need Help with t2 and t1 errors! 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I can’t remember what packet 200 is used for. Look around your server for number 200 in parenthesis like “(200);” and post the surrounding code here.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with t2 and t1 errors! 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

The first number after the T2 - is the packet number that was sent by the client and the client could not handle it properly (exceptions were caught, usually Nullpointer or in this case ArrayIndexOutOfBounds). In this case, you might have sent packet 200 (or the first packet # that showed up) and sent improper data with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with t2 and t1 errors! 317 [PI]

Anyone know how to fix this?^
